price: Allahu i tha: “O Iblis, ç’pate ti që s’u bashkove me ata që u përulën?”
arabic: قَالَ يَٰٓإِبۡلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّٰجِدِينَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: qāla yāib'līsu mā laka allā takūna maʿa al-sājidīna
